text:
[Verse]
City lights shining bright
Neon glow in the night
Dancing under street signs
Feeling free nothing to hide

[Verse 2]
Rhythms pounding in my chest
Electric heartbeats no rest
The night calls out my name
Join the pulse of the game

[Chorus]
Neon nights neon lights
Dizzy heights endless sights
Feel the beat move your feet
In the glow life is sweet

[Verse 3]
Windows down breeze through hair
Music loud we don’t care
Chasing dreams through the haze
In this city’s neon maze

[Bridge]
Footsteps echo on the street
Pair of lovers hearts meet
Underneath the pink lights
Magic of the neon nights

[Chorus]
Neon nights neon lights
Dizzy heights endless sights
Feel the beat move your feet
In the glow life is sweet
title: Neon Nights
